title: Micro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: First vegetarian bistro in Puglia. The menu includes always a vegan meal, a raw food dish and a gluten free option. The Italian ingredients are combined with Asian spices. Organic and local vegan wine and beer. Serves dinner main courses and small tapas entrees. Ambiance can be romantic, elegant, or casual. Limited seating. Also an art gallery and live music venue.
